question: days of our lives cast doug and julie
api_result: As of my last update, the characters Doug and Julie Williams from the soap opera "Days of Our Lives" are portrayed by Bill Hayes and Susan Seaforth Hayes. Bill Hayes joined the show in 1970, and Susan Seaforth Hayes began her role as Julie in 1968. The characters are one of the show's most enduring and beloved couples, known for their deep romance and complex storylines over the decades. Their real-life marriage, which began in 1974, has also endeared them further to fans of the show.
